titleStmt.title: A letter written by the Prince Elector of Brandenbourgh unto the King of France, declaring the reasons inducing his Electoral Highnes to take up arms against the King of Sweden. Translated out of the Latine coppies.
titleStmt.author: Friedrich Wilhelm, Elector of Brandenburg, 1620-1688.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by J.C. for John Crooke, at the sign of the Ship, in St. Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
